alert.note: Alert for Monroe; Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:57PM CDT until August 12 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Cherokee County in southwestern North Carolina... Western Clay County in southwestern North Carolina... Southeastern Polk County in east Tennessee... Southeastern Monroe County in east Tennessee... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 356 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 15 miles northwest of Murphy to Ducktown, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement reported trees down to the west. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Andrews, Murphy, Ducktown, Hayesville, William L. Davenport Refuge, Tusquitee, Violet, Copperhill, Hiawasse Dam, and Marble. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
